# UI Components Vista provides a comprehensive library of pre-built UI components for building modern user interfaces. ## Component Categories - [Text Components](/vista/wiki/core/components/text-components/) - Labels, titles, subtitles - [Button Controls](/vista/wiki/core/components/button-controls/) - Buttons and key buttons - [Input Fields](/vista/wiki/core/components/input-fields/) - Text inputs, textareas, selects - [Selection Controls](/vista/wiki/core/components/selection-controls/) - Checkboxes, toggles, radio groups - [Sliders & Choice](/vista/wiki/core/components/sliders-choice/) - Sliders, rotary, drop lists - [Containers](/vista/wiki/core/components/containers/) - Boxes, panels, groups - [Layout Containers](/vista/wiki/core/components/layout-containers/) - Rows, columns, grids - [Navigation](/vista/wiki/core/components/navigation-components/) - Tabs, toolbar, menubar - [Data Display](/vista/wiki/core/components/data-display/) - Lists, tables - [Visual Dividers](/vista/wiki/core/components/visual-divider/) - Dividers, spacers, splits - [Canvas](/vista/wiki/core/components/canvas-artifacts/) - Canvas elements ## Basic Usage `view .html [ text "Hello, World!" button "Click Me" [print "Clicked!"] field "Enter text..." [] checkbox "Accept terms" [] ]` ## See Also - [Layout](/vista/wiki/core/layout/) - Layout system - [Events](/vista/wiki/core/events/) - Event handling
